t: Vindicate*pn me, my God, and*ld plead my cause against*ld an unfaithful nation. Rescue*ln me from those who are deceitful*ld and wicked.
You*ln are God my stronghold. Why*ld have you rejected me? Why*ln must I go about mourning, oppressed*ld by the enemy?
Send*ln me your light and your faithful care, let*ld them lead me; let*ln them bring me to your holy mountain, to*ld the place where you dwell.
Then*ln I will go to the altar of God, to*ld God, my joy and my delight. I*ln will praise you with the lyre, O*ld God, my God.
Why,*pn my soul, are you downcast? Why*ld so disturbed within me? Put*ln your hope in God, for*ld I will yet praise him, my*ld Savior and my God.
